chapter.title: Quick Start Guide
chapter.para: This will answer the question "How do I get my existing Publication Types working with Workflow?". The reason for this is that every publication type now needs a workflow attached to it. If it does not, you will receive an error.

step.para: Edit your publication type and assign a workflow to it. If you are not sure which one to use, use the Standard workflow. It mimics the Postnuke News module which most people should be familiar with. Check also the workflow list in the previous section of this manual.
Go to Configuration::Workflow and edit your publication type. This allows you to set up the needed workflow information specific to your publication type.
Start using it. Play around with it. Create a new publication. Work with a few that already exist. It should start making sense quickly.
